trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hillsboro
There were no other sightings in Hillsboro on or around December 25th 2012
Summary: On Christmas Eve 2012 Spotted 10+ Disc Shaped Objects in Hillsboro, Oregon
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend were driving East on Cornell Rd. on our way to get gas, and as we were passing the Arco Gas station we both noticed some disc shaped crafts coming up above the horizon from the Northeast. We then stopped at the Arco gas station and began taking pictures with our cell phone camera. The pictures obviously do the event no justice but at least we caught them. One of the pictures has serious motion blur and cause the lights to take the shape of nines. So just know that the objects did not in any way look like that to my eyes.
